TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SelectionRangeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供类型转换器，用于在 对象和其他类型之间进行转换。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示单个日期或日期范围。The class represents a single date or a range of dates. 此类通常与控件相关联 ，它表示所选日期和突出显示日期。This class is commonly associated with the control, where it represents the selected and highlighted dates. 类是的附属类， 使你能够与其他类型（最常见的字符串）相互转换。The class is an adjunct class to that enables you to convert to and from other types, most often strings. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅 基类、 [通用化类型转换](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada)和 [如何：实现类型转换器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the base class, [Generalized Type Conversion](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada), and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). > [!NOTE] > 永远不应创建 。You should never create a . 而应调用 类的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅基类中的示例 。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

span.span: Generalized Type Conversion
How to: Implement a Type Converter

returns.span: 如果转换器能执行指定的转换，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类专用于在类型和之间进行转换 。The class is specialized to convert between the types and . 因此， `true` 如果 `sourceType` 参数的类型为，则该方法返回 。As a result, the method returns `true` if the `sourceType` parameter is of type . 否则，它会将调用推迟到此方法的基实现 。Otherwise, it defers the call to the base implementation of this method, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法专用于将 表示日期范围的值转换为其 表示形式。The method is specialized to convert values that represent a range of dates to their representations. 以外的类型 将传递给此方法的基类实现。Types other than are passed to the base class implementation of this method.

span.span: is of type that was parsed into two strings, but the conversion of one or both into the type did not succeed.

span.span: If successful, the newly created ; otherwise, this method throws an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可通过创建现有不可变对象的修改版本来对其进行更改。Use the method to make changes to an existing immutable object by creating a modified version of it. 此方法要求 `propertyValues` 参数具有键值为和的元素 `Start` ，每个元素都具有 `End` 相应的 值。This method expects the `propertyValues` parameter to have elements with key values of `Start` and `End`, each with the corresponding value.

exception.span: 为 或其 Start 和 End 元素未能转换为 。

span.span: is or its Start and End elements could not be converted into a .
